t: The 7 best home safes of 2025, tested against fire, water, and a sledgehammer
s: 3 days ago - The Waterproof and Fireproof Digital Safe has the added security of requiring a code and physical key to open it. It is UL classified to handle 1700 degrees Fahrenheit for an hour. I misread the rating and kept it in the fire for nearly two hours. No problem: The contents were perfectly safe, even the USB jump drive functioned perfectly after the burning experience. SentrySafe is an affiliate of Master Lock, and thus, many of the brands...
